<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ModelUnderTrainingRunner - training mode implementation. It uses TFLite</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to dynamically load and evaluate a TF SavedModel</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// lib/Analysis/models/saved-model-to-tflite.py. Runtime performance is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sacrificed for ease of use while training.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
